selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the table data from the attached image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to convert the image of the table into text format for further analysis.

selected_skills.name: count_objects_in_region
selected_skills.purpose: To count the number of blocks with exactly 36 houses.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to count the rows in the extracted text where the number of houses is exactly 36.
